{"id":506308395,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1623400764,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/506308395/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reformat(string s) {\n        string ans;\n        vector<char> nums;\n        vector<char> alphas;\n        for (auto x: s) if (isalpha(x))\n                alphas.push_back(x);\n            else\n                nums.push_back(x);\n        int diff = nums.size() - alphas.size();\n        if (abs(diff) > 1) return \"\";\n        int i = 0, j = 0, mx = max(nums.size(), alphas.size());\n        if (nums.size() >= alphas.size()){\n            for (int k = 0; k < mx; ++k) {\n                if (i < nums.size()) ans += nums[i++];\n                if (j < alphas.size()) ans += alphas[j++];\n            }\n        } else {\n            for (int k = 0; k < mx; ++k) {\n                if (j < alphas.size()) ans += alphas[j++];\n                if (i < nums.size()) ans += nums[i++];\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string"}
